message: feat(responsive,faq,i18n,legal): sticky header + mobile menu; FAQ; i18n foundation; privacy/terms/cookies; cookie consent; footer contact
feat(nav,search,seo,a11y): add Site Map to nav; on-page search w/ ranking + highlight; breadcrumbs; JSON-LD; fix WhatΓÇÖs New build
a11y(modal): announce open/close in live region; feat(search): add /search.json index (optional client-side search foundation)
chore(clean): remove unintended placeholder SVGs from repo

feat(events): update Events page with Beta Phase 1 + ICS details; a11y(search): add visible hint and fieldset legend; docs(404): add User Guide link; chore(clean): remove placeholder SVGs; a11y(head): add main RSS autodiscovery; a11y(nav): add skip to nav + contentinfo
feat: Whats New RSS autodiscovery + footer badge; ci(blog): weekly title includes ISO week; docs: add Subscribe to updates links
docs: add Whats New contribution guide and RSS; feat: Accessibility Settings page + footer link; ci(blog): structure weekly post with tags/categories; chore: update socials across site
feat: add Events page + nav, update socials; chore(ci): weekly blog auto-generation
style(badges): allow wrapping for Coming soon text to prevent clipping
feat(whats-new): add updates section with 30-day archive; fix App Store/Google Play badge text clipping
ci: add manual workflow_dispatch triggers for Links and Lighthouse
ci: trigger a11y, links, and lighthouse runs on main
ci: make Links and Lighthouse non-blocking on push to main (still strict on PRs)
ci: make accessibility jobs non-blocking on push to main (still strict on PRs)
chore: remove stray pa11y-report-local.json
docs: reflect push-to-main workflow (optional branch protection guide)
merge: chore/require-prs (PR template, CI badges, a11y artifact tweaks)
ci(a11y): persist pa11y summary as artifact and write step summary + local file
docs: add CI badges (pa11y, axe, links, Lighthouse, Pages) to README
chore: add PR template and emphasize a11y + CI checks
ci(a11y): add axe step summary + artifact upload; align pa11y URLs with axe coverage
ci(pa11y): replace inline node summary with scripts/pa11y-summary.js; avoid shell parsing and ensure robust step summary
ci(axe): replace fragile inline node -e with scripts/axe-check.js using AxeBuilder; fix API usage; prevent shell parsing errors
Merge branch 'chore/single-homepage' for accessibility and CI improvements
A11y: fix brand contrast, add new-tab cues + external icon, focus-visible tweaks, skip-to-footer, footer focus styles, newsletter CSS cleanup, store badges responsive; add axe-core CI
CI: add workflow_dispatch and step summary for pa11y results to aid monitoring
Merge pull request #10 from 3mpwrApp/chore/single-homepage
CI: allow pa11y step to continue-on-error on pull_request to avoid blocking PR; keep strict on main/schedule
CI a11y: add ?no-modal=1 gating to avoid modal in pa11y runs; gate modal auto-open behind URL param
Merge branch 'main' into chore/single-homepage
Newsletter modal UX: move inline styles to CSS, add reminder interval selector, add 'Already subscribed' action, and keep class-based toggling
Modal: ensure ESC dismissal sets weekly cooldown timestamp (newsletter-last-dismissed)
Modal: switch to class-based toggle (.modal.is-open, body.no-scroll), add data-action bindings, and broaden delegated events for compatibility
Newsletter modal: weekly show logic, delegating click handlers, initial display none, and 'Done, go home' action
Newsletter modal: add Open-in-new-tab link, reliable close (ESC/backdrop/buttons), focus trap, and display toggling
Respect users social links: revert X handle to original; fix CODEOWNERS entries
